name: Aïda Opera
description:
Inspired by the Verdi's Opera Aïda

The team :

Graphics by : Christelle Heurtaux and Mathieu Malette
Music composed by : David Lavoie
Animations by : Mathieu Malette
Game designer : Marc-André Lavoie, David Lavoie, Christelle Heurtaux, Mathieu Malette
Programmer : Marc-André Lavoie

This game was created for the JamNations June 2016 event

How to play :

Don't let the General and his army go thru ! If you are playing on a computer, use the keys 1 to 7 when the enemy walk on the green zone or yellow zone.

If playing on a midi keyboard : use the C range.

Accumulate combos and score as you fight the egyptian army.
